org.deeplearning4j.bagofwords.vectorizer

Class BagOfWordsVectorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.bagofwords.vectorizer.BaseTextVectorizer
      • org.deeplearning4j.bagofwords.vectorizer.BagOfWordsVectorizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TextVectorizer, Vectorizer

    public class BagOfWordsVectorizer
extends BaseTextVectorizer
    Bag of words vectorizer. Transforms a document in to a bag of words
